page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Carters Soft Drinks, Old Sawley Manufacturers and Bottlers employ 250 people. Dobsons Boat Builders, Shardlow build new crafts, dinghies to large yachts employ 6 people. Davison Bros. Repairers, Sawley employ 18 people. Hayley & Weller Ltd, Shardlow 86 people make fireworks and pyrotechnics for the military. Marshalls Concrete Products, Sawley, make slabs, paving, curbs & edgings. Employ 60 workers. Printaform Machinery Ltd., Sawley, manufacture & build printing machinery & employ 9 workers. Former warehouses at Shardlow have been converted for use of small businesses; re-upholstery, sheetmetal work, car repairs. John Waring, animal food manufacturer.
